error.message: The 'decorative_image_widget' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.7.7 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
